trans-unit.source: Provides the XAML type system identifier for a member if the member is also a XAML directive.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o identificador do sistema de tipo XAML para um membro, se o membro também for uma diretiva XAML.

trans-unit.source: XAML readers and XAML writers use the XamlDirective identifier during processing of member nodes.
trans-unit.target: Os leitores XAML e gravadores XAML usam o identificador de XamlDirective durante o processamento de nós de membro.

trans-unit.source: The identifier is used when the XAML reader is positioned on a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref> and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsDirective*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador é usado quando o leitor XAML é posicionado em uma <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"> </xref> e <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsDirective*>é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsDirective*>

trans-unit.source: XamlDirective provides expected values for the XAML type system when the member is a XAML directive.
trans-unit.target: XamlDirective fornece os valores esperados para o sistema de tipo XAML quando o membro é uma diretiva XAML.

trans-unit.source: By definition, a XAML directive has characteristics that always return the same results for a subset of the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> properties, and the same XAML type system information is reported for all possible XAML directives.
trans-unit.target: Por definição, uma diretiva XAML tem características que sempre retornam os mesmos resultados para um subconjunto de <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>Propriedades e as mesmas informações de sistema de tipo XAML é relatado para todas as diretivas XAML possíveis.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>

trans-unit.source: The reporting of XAML type system characteristics that are specific to directives is accomplished by internal behavior or through overrides of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> `Lookup*` virtual members in the XamlDirective class.
trans-unit.target: O relatório de características do sistema de tipo de XAML são específicas para diretivas é realizado pelo comportamento interno ou por meio de substituições de <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> `Lookup*` membros virtuais em classe XamlDirective.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the returned results of a XAML directive for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> when the member is actually a XamlDirective: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.LookupCustomAttributeProvider%2A> is always `null`.
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir mostra os resultados retornados de uma diretiva XAML para <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>quando o membro é realmente um XamlDirective:- <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.LookupCustomAttributeProvider%2A>é sempre `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.LookupCustomAttributeProvider%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DeferringLoader%2A> is always `null`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DeferringLoader%2A>é sempre `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DeferringLoader%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A> is always `null`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A>é sempre `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsAmbient%2A> is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsAmbient%2A>é sempre `false`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsAmbient%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsAttachable%2A> is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsAttachable%2A>é sempre `false`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsAttachable%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsDirective%2A> is always `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsDirective%2A>é sempre `true`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsDirective%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsEvent%2A> is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsEvent%2A>é sempre `false`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsReadOnly%2A> is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsReadOnly%2A>é sempre `false`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsReadPublic%2A> is always `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsReadPublic%2A>é sempre `true`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsReadPublic%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic%2A> is always `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic%2A>é sempre `true`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the internal backing for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DeclaringType%2A> remains unset and returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o suporte interno para <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DeclaringType%2A>mantém indefinido e retorna `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DeclaringType%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > XamlDirective is a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> subclass.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > XamlDirective é um <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>subclasse.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>

trans-unit.source: As with <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>, XamlDirective has security considerations regarding how the XAML type system reports access.
trans-unit.target: Assim como acontece com <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>, XamlDirective tem considerações de segurança sobre como o sistema de tipo XAML relatórios acesso.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>

trans-unit.source: See Remarks in <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>.
trans-unit.target: Consulte comentários <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> class, specifying values for a name and a single XAML namespace.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref> classe, especificando valores para um nome e um único namespace XAML.

trans-unit.source: Use this signature only when you want or expect <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown*> to report <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for the directive.
trans-unit.target: Use esta assinatura somente quando você deseja ou espera <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown*>relatório <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> para a diretiva.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown*>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This signature of the constructor always generates an identifier for the directive where <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A> reports `true` for the XAML type system.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Essa assinatura do construtor sempre gera um identificador para a diretiva onde <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A>relatórios `true` sistema de tipos para a linguagem XAML.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the necessary information is available (the backing type and a text syntax information item for conversion) and you want an identifier that can apply the directive, use the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> constructor signature instead.
trans-unit.target: Se as informações necessárias estão disponíveis (o tipo de backup e um item de informação de sintaxe do texto para conversão) e desejar que um identificador que pode aplicar a diretiva, use o <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>assinatura de construtor em vez disso.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you use this signature, the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.AllowedLocation%2A> value for the instance is <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations>; and the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Type%2A> value and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.TypeConverter%2A> value are both `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar essa assinatura, o <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.AllowedLocation%2A>valor para a instância é <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations>; e o <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Type%2A>valor e <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.TypeConverter%2A>valor são ambos `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.TypeConverter%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Type%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.AllowedLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The primary XAML namespace where this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> can exist.
trans-unit.target: O namespace XAML primário onde isso <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref> pode existir.

trans-unit.source: The identifying name of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome de identificação do <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> class, specifying values for each per-case value of a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref> classe, especificando valores para cada valor por caso de um <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You must use this constructor to generate a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> that does not report <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A> as `true`.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar esse construtor para gerar um <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>que não relata <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A>como `true`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>

trans-unit.source: A set of XAML namespaces where this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> can exist, passed as an enumerable set of the identifier strings.
trans-unit.target: Um conjunto de namespaces XAML onde isso <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref> podem existir, passado como um conjunto enumerável de cadeias de caracteres de identificador.

trans-unit.source: The identifying name of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome de identificação do <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The XAML type that backs the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de XAML que faz o <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type converter that this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> uses for text syntax conversion.
trans-unit.target: O conversor de tipo que este <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref> usa para conversão de sintaxe do texto.

trans-unit.source: A value of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref href="System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The xamlType parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The xamlType parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies the XAML node types where the directive can be specified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica os tipos de nós XAML em que a diretiva pode ser especificada.

trans-unit.source: You can set this value in the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Xaml.XamlType%2CSystem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter%7BSystem.ComponentModel.TypeConverter%7D%2CSystem.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations%29> constructor signature.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir esse valor <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Xaml.XamlType%2CSystem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter%7BSystem.ComponentModel.TypeConverter%7D%2CSystem.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations%29>assinatura de construtor.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Xaml.XamlType%2CSystem.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter%7BSystem.ComponentModel.TypeConverter%7D%2CSystem.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations%29>

trans-unit.source: If you construct by using the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> constructor signature, the AllowedLocation value for the instance is <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations>.
trans-unit.target: Se você criar usando a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29>assinatura de construtor, o valor de AllowedLocation para a instância é <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations>.</xref:System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: However, the instance always reports <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A> as `true`.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a instância de relatórios sempre <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A>como `true`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior typically affects attempts to write object graphs and also affects other practical uses of a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> value.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse comportamento afeta tenta gravar objeto gráficos e também afeta outros usos práticos de um <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>valor.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>

trans-unit.source: You typically would not construct a XAML directive case where AllowedLocation is <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Você normalmente não poderia construir um caso de diretiva XAML onde AllowedLocation é <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor da enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default is the enumeration default, which is <xref href="System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o padrão de enumeração, que é <xref href="System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para este objeto.

trans-unit.source: An integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash de número inteiro.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of XAML namespaces where this XAML member can exist.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma lista de namespaces XAML onde esse membro XAML pode existir.

trans-unit.source: The XAML namespace identifiers are strings that typically appear in the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) string form according to the usual conventions for XAML and XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: Os identificadores de namespace XAML são cadeias de caracteres que geralmente aparecem no formato de cadeia de caracteres de identificador de recurso uniforme (URI) acordo com as convenções habituais para namespaces XML e XAML.

trans-unit.source: If the list contains more than one item, the first item in the set is usually the relevant primary XAML namespace for processing purposes, and the other items are alternates.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista contiver mais de um item, o primeiro item no conjunto de geralmente é o namespace XAML primário relevante para fins de processamento e outros itens são alternativas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.PreferredXamlNamespace%2A?displayProperty=fullName> relies on this ordering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.PreferredXamlNamespace%2A?displayProperty=fullName>conta com essa classificação.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.PreferredXamlNamespace%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A list of XAML namespace identifiers, as strings.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de identificadores de namespace XAML, como cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider"> </xref> implementação.

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Because a XAML directive cannot have custom attributes, this implementation always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Como uma diretiva XAML não pode ter atributos personalizados, essa implementação sempre retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> seals this virtual member; therefore, all <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> types and all predefined XAML directives must use this behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>lacra esse membro virtual; Portanto, todos os <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>todas as diretivas XAML predefinidas e tipos devem usar esse comportamento.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective></xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter%601> object, which is used during deferred loading of XAML-declared objects.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter%601> objeto, que é usado durante o carregamento adiado dos objetos declarado em XAML.

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Because a directive cannot have deferred loading, this implementation always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Como uma diretiva não pode ter adiadas carregamento, essa implementação sempre retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> seals this virtual member; therefore, all <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> types and all predefined XAML directives must use this behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>lacra esse membro virtual; Portanto, todos os <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>todas as diretivas XAML predefinidas e tipos devem usar esse comportamento.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective></xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma lista de <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The list reports the members where dependency relationships for initialization order exist relative to this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A lista reporta os membros em que relações de dependência para ordem de inicialização existem em relação a esse <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Because a XAML directive cannot have initialization order, this implementation always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Como uma diretiva XAML não pode ter a ordem de inicialização, essa implementação sempre retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> seals this virtual member; therefore, all <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> types and all predefined XAML directives must use this behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>lacra esse membro virtual; Portanto, todos os <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>todas as diretivas XAML predefinidas e tipos devem usar esse comportamento.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective></xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Xaml.Schema.XamlMemberInvoker"></xref> that is associated with a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <xref href="System.Xaml.Schema.XamlMemberInvoker"> </xref> que está associado com um <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Invoker%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser chamado por chamadas para <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Invoker%2A>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Invoker%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation returns an internal static <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlMemberInvoker> value that is specific to directives in the XAML type system.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação retorna um estático interno <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlMemberInvoker>valor específico para diretivas do sistema de tipo XAML.</xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlMemberInvoker>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> seals this virtual member; therefore, all <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> types and all predefined XAML directives must use this behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>lacra esse membro virtual; Portanto, todos os <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>todas as diretivas XAML predefinidas e tipos devem usar esse comportamento.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective></xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xaml.Schema.XamlMemberInvoker"></xref> information for this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xaml.Schema.XamlMemberInvoker"> </xref> informações para este <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"></xref> is reported as an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se isso <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"> </xref> será relatado como uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: Because a XAML directive cannot be an ambient type, this implementation always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Como uma diretiva XAML não pode ser um tipo de ambiente, essa implementação sempre retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> seals this virtual member; therefore, all <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> types and all predefined XAML directives must use this behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>lacra esse membro virtual; Portanto, todos os <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>todas as diretivas XAML predefinidas e tipos devem usar esse comportamento.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective></xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> represents an event.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se isso <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref> representa um evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> seals this virtual member; therefore, all <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> types and all predefined XAML directives must use this behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>lacra esse membro virtual; Portanto, todos os <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>todas as diretivas XAML predefinidas e tipos devem usar esse comportamento.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective></xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> represents an intended read-only property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se isso <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref> representa uma propriedade somente leitura pretendida.

trans-unit.source: By definition, directives are settable.
trans-unit.target: Por definição, as diretivas são configuráveis.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> seals this virtual member; therefore, all <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> types and all predefined XAML directives must use this behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>lacra esse membro virtual; Portanto, todos os <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>todas as diretivas XAML predefinidas e tipos devem usar esse comportamento.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective></xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>

trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> represents a member that is not resolvable by the backing system that is used for type and member resolution.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se isso <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref> representa um membro que não pode ser resolvido pelo sistema de backup que é usado para resolução de tipo e membro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> implementation only calls base and does nothing more.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>implementação apenas chama base e não faz nada mais.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>

trans-unit.source: The base implementation returns the results in this order: the results are based on internal reflection; or the results are based on checking for a null value of the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.UnderlyingMember%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base retorna os resultados nesta ordem: os resultados são baseados em reflexão interno; ou os resultados com base na verificação de um valor nulo de <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.UnderlyingMember%2A>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.UnderlyingMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> represents a non-resolvable member; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref> representa um membro não pode ser resolvido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Essa implementação sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Target types are not relevant for directives; therefore, this implementation always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Tipos de destino não são relevantes para diretivas; Portanto, essa implementação sempre retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> seals this virtual member; therefore, all <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> types and all predefined XAML directives must use this behavior.

trans-unit.source: If XAML namespace information is available, this implementation returns a string combination of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.PreferredXamlNamespace%2A> and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver informações do namespace XAML, essa implementação retorna uma combinação de cadeia de caracteres de <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.PreferredXamlNamespace%2A>e <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Name%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.PreferredXamlNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.target: Se as informações do namespace XAML não estiverem disponíveis, essa implementação retorna <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Name%2A>
